pullRequest.title: [FLINK-18529][hive] Query Hive table and filter by timestamp partitio…
pullRequest.bodyText:
…n can fail

What is the purpose of the change
Fix the issue that querying a Hive table and filter by timestamp partition column can fail.
Brief change log

Don't try to generate date/timestamp literals in ExpressionExtractor, because such filters cannot be pushed down anyway.
Add more test cases

Verifying this change
Existing and added tests
